A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually one of the best star wars films in recent memory\, the second installment of the third trilogy makes bold statements that it (largely) backs up. While a couple characters motivations seem to flip-flop a few too many times and the movie gets sidetracked while making a very much appreciated point about war\, it's absolutely a must see for those who thought TFA played it too safe. Farewell\, Jakku! You will not be missed!
